title: There is an off-meta OP build for Yasuo and it WORKS
body:
https://i.imgur.com/LtTu116.png

Blue team was far behind but after Yasuo finished his randuinds they started DESTROYING the red team

replies.body: Game is still in progress on saltyteemo stream, you can watch it live. Yasuo just 1v1ed enemy zed support with no problem.
what elo is this? silver? xD

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZnQEL2MZ,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-06-10T13:00:21.762+0000)
>
> what elo is this? silver? xD

iron

xD you trying to compile a "Try not to laugh" montage?

Iron means fuck all mate, everyone there is terrible, the left team doesn't even have an adc.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZnQEL2MZ,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-10T13:04:25.305+0000)
>
> xD you trying to compile a "Try not to laugh" montage?
> 
> Iron means fuck all mate, everyone there is terrible, the left team doesn't even have an adc.

this yasuo wasn't terrible, that's the thing. he was great.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZnQEL2MZ,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-10T13:04:25.305+0000)
>
> xD you trying to compile a "Try not to laugh" montage?
> 
> Iron means fuck all mate, everyone there is terrible, the left team doesn't even have an adc.

but lee sin in red team was a silver iv. no idea what a silver iv is doing in iron game

I'll save you some time, don't watch anything bellow masters. It doesn't mean anything.

Silver 4 is very close to iron. Because iron has so few people in it. and silver 4 can mean he has an MMR of a bronzie. So it's not strange at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZnQEL2MZ,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-10T13:08:09.125+0000)
>
> I'll save you some time, don't watch anything bellow masters. It doesn't mean anything.
> 
> Silver 4 is very close to iron. Because iron has so few people in it. and silver 4 can mean he has an MMR of a bronzie. So it's not strange at all.

and plat is just silver with a fresh coat of paint, don't be decieved

Especially in NA and their low player count, if you look at Iron population you will understand why I am saying that a silver 4 is not very strange to be put in iron games.


Playing in plat and playing in silver is miles different, idk why you would think it feels the same.
But if you see someone stomping plat with a strange pick, you can't really claim it is OP, because you don't know if it's a smurf or if they simply OTP that specific strategy vs unknowing opponents. But if you see someone stomping masters with a strange pick, you can pretty much say "Yeah this must be a really strong strategy/pick"
there are too many questions that i don't want to be answered
also one more thing, that zed got rekt by this yas 1v1
Lord have mercy on this mans soul.
